content.question: How many kilowatt hours (<math alttext="kilowatt hour" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>kWh</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) per year does refrigerator <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> use?
